attributes.action: Stop unmarked police vehicles from trying to stop vehicles
attributes.additional_details:
I have seen recent incidences of so called plain clothes police vehicles chasing cars at silly speeds, these have even been seen on TV. To see a car chasing you that may have lights inside and anybody can do that, it is not illegal, it can be extremely disturbing and dangerous through communities, it must be that in any so called chase circumstance the vehicle must be well marked.
 For any unmarked police car to do 80MPH thru a 30 MPH limit is frankly extremely dangerous, it is bad enough for a marked vehicle.
